channel.title: Guest blogging on the way out
channel.description:
I saw this post on HN about guest blogging by the SEO head honcho at Google. If you're using guest blogging to market then it is probably worth a read.
http://www.mattcutts.com/blog/guest-blogging/

item.title: Guest blogging on the way out
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
I get contacted by low-life ‘content marketers’ almost daily asking to put guest posts on http://www.successfulsoftware.net . When I have asked to see the post it is nearly always:
a) not relevant to my audience
b) a piece of crap

I have sent a few of them a link to this article:
http://finchsells.com/2012/09/03/the-rise-of-the-content-marketing-moron/

The sooner we can stick them all on a B Ark, the better.

Read full topic
item.source: Guest blogging on the way out

item.title: Guest blogging on the way out
item.dc:creator: globalwj
item.description:
I saw this post on HN about guest blogging by the SEO head honcho at Google. If you’re using guest blogging to market then it is probably worth a read.

Matt Cutts: Gadgets, Google, and SEO – 20 Jan 14

The decay and fall of guest blogging for SEO

Okay, I’m calling it: if you’re using guest blogging as a way to gain links in 2014, you should probably stop. Why? Because over time it’s become a more and more spammy practice, …

Read full topic
item.source: Guest blogging on the way out
